        <script><![CDATA[
            (function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
        var isUseScheduleStateToggleActive = new global.ScheduledStateUtil().getUseScheduledState();
        var acceptedFields = ["work_notes", "short_description", "description", "home_travel_duration"];
        var didNonAcceptedFieldsChange = false;
        var errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unable to move task. Task is schedule locked.");
        var stateNameToNumberRef = {
			"Assigned" : 16,
			"Scheduled": 12
		};

        var changedFieldNames = GlideScriptRecordUtil.get(current).getChangedFieldNames();
		changedFieldNames = j2js(changedFieldNames);

        for (var i = 0; i < changedFieldNames.length; i++) {
            var localFieldName = changedFieldNames[i];

            if (acceptedFields.indexOf(localFieldName) > -1) {
                continue;
            } else if (localFieldName.includes("sys_")) {
                continue;
            } else if (!isUseScheduleStateToggleActive && previous.state == stateNameToNumberRef["Scheduled"] && current.state == stateNameToNumberRef["Assigned"] && (localFieldName == "state" || localFieldName == "dispatched_on")) {
                // This condition is only skipped when the previous state was Scheduled, and the current state is to be updated as Assigned.
                // If the useScheduleStateToggle is turned off, we update the wot state to assigned, and the dispatched on field.
                // In that case the field values of state, and dispatched_on are updated. (These fields cannot change on regular wot update with schedule lock on).
                // We continue checking the next field without resetting the didNonAcceptedFieldsChange flag to true.
				continue;
            } else {
                didNonAcceptedFieldsChange = true;
                break;
            }
        }

        if (previous.schedule_lock == current.schedule_lock) {
            if (didNonAcceptedFieldsChange) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
                global.FSMUtil.setAbortAction(current, true);
            }
        }
    } catch (err) {
        gs.error("Error:FSM, Business Rule - wm_task table, Prevent update on locked tasks failed" + err);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script>
